message:
استفسار بسيط بخصوص AJAX و PHP
بستعمل Framework اسمه cjax وده لكتابة الاجاكس بال PHP بدون اي كتابة للجافا سكربت ولكن مشكلة هذا ال Framework ان اخر تحديث له كان في 2012 
هل في Framework بديل ليه ؟
انا عايز اكتب اجاكس من غير ما اتعرض للجافاسكربت
شكرا
story: Mokhtar Ali Ebrahim shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Cjax | Web Development Ajax Framework in PHP
caption: phpajax.net
description: Cjax is an MVC (Model-View-Controller) oriented, lightweight (>100kb) ajax framework aimed at PHP applications/sites. It allows you to literally execute JavaScript with PHP, sounds facinating - eh? Well it's true (You may test some demos).

data.message: Ajax without JavaScript? it's called (Asynchronous JavaScript and XML) :D
المكتبة تتولى امور الجافا سكربت بنفسها وليس معناها انه لا تستعمل الجافا سكربت
طب ما ننضفوا ونستخدم Backbone ولا Angular

If, most probably, you will be working in Egypt for the first 3 years at least. I would learn ASP.NET and possibly try to master SharePoint. Of course add to that one of the JS frameworks and Entity Framework. This way you will be emloyable in 95% of companies. Anything else is only 5% of the Egyptian job market. Allah knows best :)
I have nothing to say but ( YOU SHOULD LEARN JS )
